name: Pink Sox 2
description: Pink Sox 2 is a collection of adult-themed mini-games in various genres. It includes the continuation of the sci-fi Japanese-style adventure (entitled Who Is There?) from the previous game; another scenario in the mini-adventure Halftime Lover; a simple card game of a slightly different variety (the goal is to run out of cards by selecting those of a higher value than the opponent's); and a mini-game that combines elements of quiz with tile-matching puzzle, leading to an erotic image different from the one in the first game.
